name: Quing's Quest VII: The Death of Videogames!
name_original: Quing's Quest VII: The Death of Videogames!
description:
You are a young monarch of mysterious and indistinct gender, valiantly trying to survive exile from your home planet -- or whatever's left of it since the invasion, anyway.

Online play: squinky.me/quing

Download comes with Twine source files.
